desc: Here are some of the projects I have completed so far.
By clicking on each project, you can view the details and find the link to its live preview.

details.title: Linkie
details.shortdesc: a web app to manage and share your links with custom themes and basic analytics
desc: Built a lightweight web application using Flask to organize and share personalized collections of links, inspired by platforms like Linktree.
Implemented link management features allowing users to add, edit, and remove links easily.
Created some theme to personalize the appearance of the shared page.
Developed basic analytics functionality to track and count the number of clicks on each link.
Used SQLite as the backend database, suited for a demo use environment.
goals: Provide an easy-to-use interface for managing personal or professional links.
Enable users to customize the look and feel of their link page with multiple themes.
Offer simple analytics to give insights into link engagement.

details.title: Galaxy Trucker
details.shortdesc: digital version of the Galaxy Trucker board game
desc: Developed a digital adaptation of the popular board game Galaxy Trucker as a team project for Politecnico di Milano.
Implemented the complete game rules, local multiplayer connectivity using RMI and sockets, and handled client disconnections and reconnections.
Designed both GUI and TUI interfaces following the Model-View-Controller pattern to ensure clean architecture and maintainability.
Managed multiple simultaneous games on the same server instance, providing a robust multiplayer experience.
goals: Deliver a fully functional digital version of the Galaxy Trucker board game.
Implement seamless local multiplayer connectivity using RMI and sockets.
Ensure stable handling of network issues such as client disconnections and reconnections.
Apply the Model-View-Controller architectural pattern for clean and maintainable code.
functions: Local multiplayer with RMI and Sockets

details.title: PlanMyExams
details.shortdesc: a tool that helps you find the most optimal dates for your university exams
desc: The tool allows you to enter the details of the exams you need to take and calculates the most optimal combinations for scheduling them.

The algorithm evaluates the score of each combination based on various factors, including the time span between the first and last exam, the balance between adjacent exams, and the occurrence of multiple exams on the same date.
Based on this calculation, it suggests the best combinations, ranked from best to worst.
The project is still in beta, and I plan to add new features, such as a tutorial section, an option to edit exam details, and the ability to export the selected schedule to a calendar provider...
goals: The goal was to create a tool that helps university students efficiently organize their exam sessions.

details.title: LinkedTag
details.shortdesc: an AI tool that generates high-performing hashtags for LinkedIn posts
desc: The tool leverages the power of artificial intelligence to process the given post and suggest the most relevant hashtags for it, drawing them from a database.
Additionally, I have focused on refining both UX and UI to ensure a simple and rewarding user experience.
goals: The goal was to implement AI in a project to create something functional and useful.

details.title: Trend Tribes
details.shortdesc: a custom Wordpress theme for an ecommerce based on WooCommerce
desc: It is a custom theme for the well-known WordPress CMS, accompanied by the WooCommerce plugin, to manage ecommerce functionalities.
The project aims to be as minimal as possible, both visually and technically.
goals: The goal was to create an ecommerce theme that is easy and quick to configure, so it could be put online in the shortest time possible.

details.title: Bricked
details.shortdesc: an online game inspired by Tetris
desc: I created this game to challenge myself, trying to use the knowledge I had acquired up to that point to create something.

I realize that the project may not have been structured in the most efficient way, but at least it allowed me to achieve a defined desired functionality through personal solutions, rather than external suggestions.

details.title: Minimal Tris
desc: It is a very simple game where the player can choose to play single player or multiplayer.
In the first mode, they will play against a very rudimentary AI.
In the second, they can play turn-based with a friend locally.

details.title: AchrisGraphics
details.shortdesc: a website created for a graphic designer
desc: The project serves as a portal through which to showcase one's work in a suggestive and professional manner for the client.
In fact, the entire site was created based on the stylistic and artistic directives of the client.
goals: The fundamental need is to have an online space to display one's projects.
Additionally, through this site, the client aimed to expand their client base.

details.title: Alessandra Giuliani
details.shortdesc: a website created for a nutritionist biologist
desc: It is a showcase website project for a professional who wanted to improve her online presence.
The work aims to create a simple yet comprehensive website that is also visually appealing.
goals: The client's objective was to explain on a page what her work consists of, what services she offers, and useful information to contact her.
All this with the goal of obtaining new clients.

details.title: Sander und Sommer
details.shortdesc: a website created for a german clinic
desc: It is a showcase website project for a German clinic looking for something professional and visually satisfying.
In fact, they already had a page that did not fully satisfy them.
Therefore, after understanding what their needs were, I proceeded to create their current site.
goals: The objective was to describe everything behind the clinic: the services, the team, the clients...
Clearly, all this also aimed to enhance its online presence, thereby increasing clientele.
